ygData.subject: Re: Report on Guk expedition
ygData.msgSnippet: I went there with Yiyang and Garren yesterday and we went to 3rd floor. Died there 3 times but managed to get gossimer armor tho. Big thanks to Yiyang and
ygData.messageBody:
I went there with Yiyang and Garren yesterday and we went to 3rd floor. Died
there 3 times but managed to get gossimer armor tho. Big thanks to Yiyang
and Garren for their help although we didn't managed to get any BBC ( Btw,
if yer sticking to 1st level, its quite safe but beware of trains. Usually
you don't manage to zone out becos of locked doors or there are too many
stuff hitting ya. Trains there can go up to about 10+ mobs and its not
pretty when they are all ghouls and elf skeletons....
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 21, 1999 11:27 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Report on Guk expedition


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Err, I would said it's worst than CB. It's a total failure to team a lvl
>6, a lvl 12 and a lvl 19 - big "generation" gap. I think we spend more
>than 2-3 hrs in order to get everyone their stuffs back SAFETY at
>commonland/freeport. LOL.
>
>Just imagine a weak wiz like me carrying more than double my STR allows me,
>hehe.
>
>I guess I wont go that CB place until I get invisible spell a lvl 16.
>
>Tonight I'm going to Befallen with 2 HK friends - a lvl 13 bard and a lvl
>13 magi. Any lvl 12-14 who wanna join us feel free to give me a tell when
>u login. Advice welcome. Btw, which lvl is safe for us, considering those
>undead train?
>
>
>Zil
>
>
>On Saturday, June 19, 1999 3:59 AM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
>wrote:
>> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>>
>> I declare the raid to be a total failure. We didn't get much of what we
>> want and in the end, Gary and I died while trying to get out of
>> Innothule swamp and LKW got lost. We resorted to all sort of funny ways
>> and manage to get our stuff back. (The whole process can be summarised
>> by 1 word, Cheebye)
>>
>> I took some useless screenshots. Anyone interested, request from me.
>>
>> BTW, I still need to be power leveled. I got some equipment from Gary(my
>> character's rear is still bear........) but I still lack levels.
>>
>>
